EmailTemplate.name: TEST GRADUATION
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations on taking part in The Challenge this year!
We would love to see you at the 2011 Graduation Ceremony.
Please let us know if you are coming.
RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a13301d9d6cbaa&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2=1
Where: Stationers' Hall Ave Maria Lane London EC4M 7DD
When: 28/10/2011
10:30 - 12:00
www.the-challenge.org
facebook.com/thechallengenetwork
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
